content.body: qq for the spec/test repo names. Are we keeping the tc39/ecma426 repository name on GitHub? I remember that there was some discussion to rename it back to source map but I can't seem to find it now. If not, do we plan to align the test repo name also to something like tc39/test426?
We could just leave the test suite in the main repo for now, and split it if we need to.
I don’t think we’ll ever get as complex as test262
